## âœ… Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with [x] -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have removed any console.log() or debugging statements
- [ ] My code has no linting errors or warnings

### Functionality
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have tested my changes across different browsers
- [ ] I have tested on both desktop and mobile (if applicable)
- [ ] My changes work correctly with different FEN positions
- [ ] Export functionality still works (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation (if needed)
- [ ] I have added/updated comments in the code
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG (if applicable)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error scenarios

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have not introduced unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] All dependencies are compatible and properly licensed
- [ ] Package.json is updated (if dependencies changed)

## ğŸ‘€ Reviewer Guidelines
<!-- For reviewers -->

When reviewing this PR, please check:

1. **Code Quality**: Clean, readable, and follows project conventions
2. **Functionality**: Works as described and handles edge cases
3. **Performance**: No unnecessary re-renders or performance regressions
4. **UI/UX**: Consistent with existing design and user-friendly
5. **Tests**: Adequate test coverage for new/changed functionality
6. **Documentation**: Clear comments and updated docs if needed
7. **Security**: No security vulnerabilities introduced
